article.name: Is it possible to integrate alert notifications with external services like chats?
article.title: Is it possible to integrate alert notifications with external services like chats?
article.body:
• Yes. Monitoring related alert notifications can be integrated with external services such as chats and more.
  • Supported services are as follows.
    • Slack
    • LINE（※LINE WORKS is not currently supported）
    • Chatwork
    • Typetalk
    • HipChat
    • Twilio
    • Reactio
    • PagerDuty
    • Opsgenie
    • Yammer
    • Microsoft Teams
    • Webhook
    • Amazon EventBridge
  • Any service not listed above is currently not supported for integration.
  • To integrate an unsupported service, you’ll need to provide your own integration mechanism using a service such as Webhook.
